mapper.sql: select id, device_code, device_name, device_type, location, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from t_device
mapper.select:
select d.id, d.device_code, d.device_name, d.device_type, d.location, d.status, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time, d.remark, u1.user_name as createByName, u2.user_name as updateByName from t_device d left join sys_user u1 on d.create_by = u1.user_name left join sys_user u2 on d.update_by = u2.user_name where 1=1
AND d.device_code like concat('%', #{deviceCode}, '%')
AND d.device_name like concat('%', #{deviceName}, '%')
AND d.device_type = #{deviceType}
AND d.location like concat('%', #{location}, '%')
AND d.status = #{status}
AND date_format(d.create_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND date_format(d.create_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
order by d.create_time desc

select d.id, d.device_code, d.device_name, d.device_type, d.location, d.status, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.update_by, d.update_time, d.remark, u1.user_name as createByName, u2.user_name as updateByName from t_device d left join sys_user u1 on d.create_by = u1.user_name left join sys_user u2 on d.update_by = u2.user_name where d.id = #{id}
